name: csv-metadata-quality-web
description: Simple web interface for the DSpace CSV Metadata Quality tool.
author: Alan Orth

scripts.build:css: sass --style expanded source/scss/style.scss static/css/v1/style.css.tmp && cleancss --level 1 static/css/v1/style.css.tmp -o static/css/v1/style.min.css
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run clean
